name: PURRRPETRATOR
description:
Game made for SpookJam 2019.  THEME: Hidden Below

A 2D platformer in which you play as a playful ginger cat who is stuck inside a Egyptian Crypt. You have to do your best as a cat and knock over as many Egyptians pots as possible before you get sucked back in by Anubis! The game features platforming aspects with chase AI that will disrupt you along your pit smashing adventure. The project can be played on both Keyboard & Mouse and Controller. 

Controller
Left Stick: Movement / Aim
A : Jump
B : Throw

Mouse & Keyboard 
WASD : Movement Space : Jump 
Lft Ctrl : Throw
